intro: Artanthe chimonanthifolia, commonly known as the mountain chimonanthus, is a flowering plant native to China. Its leaves are ovate to lanceolate, with a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Artanthe chimonanthifolia is often found in rocky or forested areas, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
